definition: having or covered with protective barbs or quills or spines or thorns or setae etc.
details:
adjective
- having or covered with protective barbs or quills or spines or thorns or setae etc.
= example: having or covered with protective barbs or quills or spines or thorns or setae etc.
= synonyms: burred
- very irritable
= example: very irritable
= synonyms: prickly
